thread.title: DePaul, Bruno agree to 1-year contract extension
thread.title_full: DePaul, Bruno agree to 1-year contract extension

author: Monster storm makes landfall as category 5 in Mexico
title: DePaul, Bruno agree to 1-year contract extension
text:
DePaul, Bruno agree to 1-year contract extension Associated Press 19 hrs ago Â© (AP Photo/Joe Raymond DePaul coach Doug Bruno reacts in the second half of a women's college basketball game against Minnesota in the first round of the NCAA tournament in South Bend, Ind., Friday, March 20, 2015. (AP Photo/Joe Raymond) CHICAGO (AP) -- DePaul and women's basketball coach Doug Bruno have agreed to a one-year contract extension through the 2020-21 season.Bruno enters his 30th season at DePaul with a 587-309 record. He has led the Blue Demons to 13 consecutive NCAA Tournaments and 20 in all. He was also an assistant to Connecticut's Geno Auriemma on the U.S. national team that won the 2012 Olympic gold medal, and he will assist Auriemma at the 2016 Games.
AdChoices Bruno played at DePaul under coach Ray Meyer.
